item.title: Raising Children in God’s Care: All Things to All People
item.description: Mothers often feel like they are everything to their children, but also struggle with the fear of failure and the guilt of imperfection.

item.title: The Clay and the Potter: What Isaiah 45 Teaches Us About Parenting
item.description: Our kids need us to respect their individuality and autonomy, while also helping to shape them. ⁤⁤We may feel fear and guilt since we don’t have complete control over the outcome. ⁤⁤We can do our best and trust in God’s grace and wisdom to guide us and our children through life.
